name: Word Doctor: Connect Letters
description:
Word Doctor is the most attractive and fun word puzzle game. With stunning Campus Style, you will travel from Formative Education level to Post-Ph. D level, from Confucius time to Stephen Hawking time. We crafted all special levels for you and hope you enjoy!

Still looking for a new brain training puzzle game? Welcome to the board of Word Doctor!

Try this simple, addictive and easy to play puzzle game! Your goal is to correctly swipe letters to form words. Find as many words as possible to unlock levels and earn rewards! Discover more challenges in Word Doctor! Sharpen your skills with this fun, fast-paced word game and explore THOUSANDS of levels!

FREE TO DOWNLOAD AND PLAY:
* 2500-plus levels with tons of challenging
* Use hints once you get stuck
* Improved and boosted your vocabulary
* Collect Extra words to get more bonus
* Take snapshot & play with your friends
* Colorful UI with attractive background music
* Play OFFLINE, no time limits!


Will you be able to find all hidden words and overcome all levels? Download for free NOW and play with your friends and families.

Any feedback or good suggestions? Welcome to Contact Us:
E-mail: playmilstudio@outlook.com

Like us on INSTAGRAM: @ playmilstudio

Follow us on FACEBOOK: @ playmilstudio

Enjoy! :)
